snippet: Like all vice-presidential candidates, Paul D. Ryan was picked to balance his party’s ticket, and one way he is the lid to Mitt Romney’s pot is his approachability.
abstract: Rep Paul D Ryan completes his first week as the Republican vice-presidential candidate with few slip-ups, despite being subjected to a whirlwind of media scrutiny; Ryan now must prepare for his debate with Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr and his convention speech, the two biggest challenges before Election Day.
lead_paragraph: Like all vice-presidential candidates, Paul D. Ryan was picked to balance his party’s ticket, and one way he is the lid to Mitt Romney’s pot is his approachability.

headline.seo: Ryan Enjoys First Week on Trail, and Begins to Look Ahead
headline.main: Ryan, Appearing at Ease in First Week on Trail, Begins to Look Ahead
headline.print_headline: Ryan, Appearing at Ease in First Week on Trail, Begins to Look Ahead
